official_title: A bill to restore to Federal civilian and Postal Service employees their rights to participate voluntarily, as private citizens, in the political processes of the Nation, to protect such employees from improper political solicitations.

summary.text: Permits Federal employees to participate in partisan political activity on a State or local level including campaigning for and holding any elective office on such levels or in any local political party. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 7326. Repeals 5 U.S.C. 7327)
